name: Match3 mania!
description:
Match3 mania! is a challenging variation on the theme of match3 games, in which you have to constantly struggle with an inexorable timer that counts down the seconds until the end of the game. And only your cold-blooded and quick actions and big combos will be able to pity him! Break blocks and plan your moves in advance to win as many seconds as possible to break new records. How far can you go in this battle with time?

Features:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
